claims.claim: AI enabled rapid scaling of clinical trials from hundreds to tens of thousands of participants during COVID-19
claims.quote: we expanded trials from hundreds to tens of thousands of participants and partnered with a digital health company to streamline data queries, something that would have otherwise required thousands of additional personnel

claims.claim: AI optimized vaccine design to minimize side effects through extensive simulations
claims.quote: AI also played a crucial role in optimizing vaccine design to minimize side effects through extensive simulations

claims.claim: Pfizer announced $1.7 billion in additional cost savings through digital enablement including AI and automation
claims.quote: Pfizer said the savings would come through 'digital enablement,' which includes automation and using AI in unspecified ways, as well as process simplification

claims.claim: Total cost alignment program reaches $7.7 billion in savings
claims.quote: The newly announced cuts will bring the total cost alignment program to $7.7 billion, CEO Albert Bourla said in his prepared earnings remarks

claims.claim: $500 million saved through R&D reorganization to be reinvested in pipeline
claims.quote: An additional $500 million would be saved through a reorganization of R&D to be completed by the end of 2026. Pfizer will reinvest those savings back into the pipeline

claims.claim: AI reduced drug discovery timelines from years to 30 days
claims.quote: Pfizer's AI-powered predictive machine learning research hub can now do it in 30 days or less

claims.claim: AI saved 16,000 hours annually in research through improved search capabilities
claims.quote: Using generative AI tools like Anthropic's Claude, Pfizer enables natural language searches across vast datasets, cutting search time by 80% and saving scientists 16,000 hours annually

claims.claim: AI boosted manufacturing yields by 10% and reduced cycle times by 25%
claims.quote: Their generative AI platform detects anomalies and suggests real-time actions for operators, boosting product yield by 10% and reducing cycle time by 25%
